text: Curuapira exotica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Martins and Galileo in 1998. It is known from Brazil and Venezuela.BioLib.cz - Curuapira exotica. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1998
title: Curuapira exotica
